title: Henry Robinson (Nottinghamshire cricketer)
text:
Henry Robinson (13 November 1863 – date of death unknown) was an English <a href="cricket">cricket</a>er. Robinson's <a href="Batsman%20%28cricket%29">batting</a> style is unknown. He was born at <a href="Nottingham">Nottingham</a>, <a href="Nottinghamshire">Nottinghamshire</a>.
Robinson made a single <a href="first-class%20cricket">first-class</a> appearance for <a href="Nottinghamshire%20County%20Cricket%20Club">Nottinghamshire</a> against the <a href="Marylebone%20Cricket%20Club">Marylebone Cricket Club</a> at <a href="Lord%27s">Lord's</a> in 1889. In a match which the Marylebone Cricket Club won by 7 wickets, he was dismissed in both Nottinghamshire's first and second-innings for <a href="duck%20%28cricket%29">duck's</a> by <a href="Dick%20Pougher">Dick Pougher</a>.
